tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Consultation provided for all pediatric disease,
review:
We were referred to Dr Usha Mallinath by our pediatrician form Fortis Hospital for further treatment of our child 

We would like to thank  Dr Usha Mallinath

We are Extremely happy and grateful to  her for taking care of our Daughter 

our child was noticed to have certain movements and difficulty in walking . We had consulted quite a few doctors prior to visiting her . She was referred by our Pediatrician . We immediately booked an appointment and visited her . First impression itself was very pleasant.  she is highly profession and very composed person. She made us feel very comfortable. Doctor is highly respectful for her patients . She very clearly listened to us and went through all the tests which were done . She spoke to the child and child was also allowed to express herself. We were really amazed with her approach . Very rarely we had seen doctors being so Methodical. She is quite friendly with kids and our child soon felt very comfortable with her and started expressing her problems. Later she checked the child completely . She very clearly explained to us as what could be the possible reasons for the problems. We did few tests which were suggested . Again very clearly explained the reasoning for doing the test. We did MRI Brain at Hospital .Medicines were started . A detailed description of medicines and possible side effects were mentioned too. 

She is very transparent and clear in her approach. Doesnt promise false outcomes and results . Medicines were started . We are also getting regular Physiotherapy at Hospital as suggested by Doctor .We have come for regular follow ups . Our child slowly has shown tremendous improvement. Every visit she speaks to the child as well to know the progress and issues. Slowly all the problems were taken care off and child is able to walk well now with no abnormal movements .Medicines have been slowly taken off and stopped now. Our child is back to what she was before .
We were very worried about our child but the way Dr Usha has managed her is highly commendable . Our Daughter will be looking forward to meet her . Feels very happy to see such doctors who are Highly Professional , Young  and friendly . She is an Inspiration to kids . Our daughter says she would want to be like her .

Though our child is back to normal now , we visit her once in few months
She is very professional  pleasant and friendly Doctor 

Our child is doing well
Highly Recommended
Once again we would like to Thank Dr usha Mallinath and Manipal Hospital

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We are very Grateful and Glad that we could meet up with Pediatric Neurologist Dr Usha Mallinath . our child who was all well was suddenly not walking and was admitted at 2 different hospitals and was seen by Pediatric Neurologist as well . child didnt show any improvement and hence upon one of my friend‚Äôs suggestion who had good experience for their child with Dr Usha  we visited Dr usha Mallinath at Manipal Hospital .
we were very much impressed by the way she dealt with out child . Highly Professional and a very transparent person in her approach .She took complete input from us and child was completely examined . we were amazed the way she was talking and dealing with child in that critical situation too . That was a positive reinforcement for our son . we were given ample information about the condition , the possible causes and need to do relevant investigations. we followed all her advice . 

There is so much thought process involved that Doctor was so mindful that all these were not discussed in the presence of child so that child is not affected Psychologically 
She used to check the child regularly and update us about the condition . we were given all the information about the medications being used .Treatment was started and to our surprise the child showed tremendous improvement and started walking slowly and after 3 days child started walking . 
She is a doctor with Integrity and Professionalism . She gives good insight into the problem and there is no false information . This really helps to cope up with situation .
She is highly inspirational for kids too . Dr Usha Mallinath is an Wonderful Pediatric Neurologist .Highly recommended to visit for kids Brain related Problems . we had a great experience with doctor . She is quite experienced and very logical .
Thank You Dr Usha Mallinath . You are the most precious doctor we have met 
Highly Recommended

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We would like to express our Gratitude and are Highly Thankful to have met Dr Usha Mallinath . our child was in a critical situation and upon visiting  two  hospitals in Kolar we were told that child is critical and would need a specialist Pediatric Neurologist care . We immediately got our son to Manipal Hospital . Our child was not in his senses , disoriented and had significant headache . He was admitted at Pediatric Intensive care under Dr Usha Mallinath. All relevant investigations were done and treatment was started soon . we were regularly updated about reports , clinical  condition of child and treatment .

Dr Usha is such a wonderful Doctor . She is so professional and practical . She used to examine the child completely daily and make changes as needed. we were updated daily on child progress and treatment plan . Our child started recognizing us in 2 days and soon headache resolved and all other problems too. Unfortunately he had  severe Brain infection .She made a diagnosis in 2 days and all appropriate medications were commenced on timely basis . No tests were done without informing us and she would explain to us the need for test and possible side effects too. She is very clear and transparent  in her  explanation . She gives clear picture of problem .Overall Excellent care provided by the doctor .

She is so good with kids , our child started talking to her next day and would express what he is going through . She is an inspiration and Role model for Kids .

we are so happy we came to Manipal Hospital looking for Dr Usha and our son is alive today because of her .

We are blessed to be taken care by such an efficient doctor . Thank you Doctor for providing wonderful and high quality care for my child . God Bless you 

Highly recommended

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We went to manipal when my daughter nishika had multiple seizures and in emergency. She took immediate action and treatment started in few hours. She explained us the treatment plan and she listened to all our queries and explained details about the issue.. it's been 6 months with the doctor my daughter is perfectly fine as her continuous guidance and treatment plan cured my daughter illness.. Blessed to meet such good doctor whose main aim is to "no child should suffer".Her motto towards childs treatment and wellness is outstanding.everyone please consult this doctor for pediatric neurological issues as her knowledge on issues is vast and she treat according to the disease.she won't give unnecessary medicine if it's not required. At last "Thank you Doctor"üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am incredibly grateful for the care that Dr. Usha Mallinath provided for my child. Their expertise in paediatric seizure management is truly remarkable. From the first consultation, I felt reassured by their thorough understanding of my child's condition and the treatment options available. Dr. Usha took the time to explain everything in a way that was easy to understand, addressing all of my concerns and ensuring I felt informed and empowered in making decisions for my child's health. The level of compassion and patience shown by Dr. Usha is truly commendable. Thanks to their guidance and treatment plan, my child's seizures are under control, and their quality of life has improved significantly. I wholeheartedly recommend to any parent seeking top-notch care for their child's seizures.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Excellent care provided by the doctor ,Dr Usha Mallinath . we visited her from Andhra Pradesh as suggested by our friend . Both of our kids had issues with seizures and behaviour and they were on lot of medicines  which were not helping . we are very fortunate to have met the doctor. She looked into issues completly and advised to wean off medicines . As per the advice , we weaned of medicines and both our kids are doing very well now . They are competly off all medications without any problems . we are following all other advice suggested by her .
Its very easy for doctors to prescribe lot of medicines but the doctor who understands the problem , makes parents understands the same and doesnt prescribe lot of medicines is Great and is really concerned  about the well being of the  child . She is truly our Hero .
we are very satisfied that we came all the way for Andhra Pradesh and got this wonderful care form her . Its a blessing to see such well educated and  experienced doctor who cares for well being of children .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We visited Dr in Oct 21 when my 7 year old experienced seizure (thanks to SFM - school from home) and we could notice lot of sweating while playing. * ******* *** ***** ** **** ** ** *** **** ** ********** Without any delay booked an appointment and consulted the Dr. She was very friendly and advised few tests. Clearly explained the problem and advised medication to be followed. 
The way the issue was approached with clear and logical steps is really commendable. Every time the Dr sees my child, she makes him feel very comfortable speaking with him while performing the physical examination. This way both us and kids feel very reverential towards her. My kid is doing absolutely fine today. I urge all parents to not to wait for any such events and without delay a specialist has to be contacted rather than a General Paed. This enables faster analysis and early detection and cure.
On a lighter note , my kid enjoys the cafetaria canteen Dosa's and the Dr always mentions that he could be one of the few who would like so! This atttitude brings Usha (light rays) in many peoples lives and we sincerely thank the Dr from the bottom of our heart. May the light of Jupiter shine on her and entire family and may she bring light to many many more peoples lives.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We are extremely Thankful to Dr Usha Mallinath . our child was very sick and admitted to ICU with fits and lot of other problems. Child was asses completely by her and investigations were done . Medicines were started and within one day , we saw tremendous improvement in child .She explained to us in detail the problem . She also gave a clear picture of what medicines were used and possible side effects . All the investigation reports were informed to us regularly. She visited the child regularly and we were updated regularly about the condition of the child .
Really liked her approach, her attitude and the way she handles kids . our child was so comfortable with her . There was a tremendous improvement in 2 days , fits were completely under control and was transferred to ward and discharged next day.
we visit her regular follow ups. She is an amazing personality with a clarity regarding treatment . our child likes her a lot and is so happy to meet her .
our Regards to Manipal Hospital for exposing us to such a great doctor. Nursing staff took good care of our child and the hospital very clean and hygienic.
Once again Thank you Dr Usha Mallinath for all your wonderful care
